demo.login: Create a fake account first. Stripe test card: 4242 4242 4242 4242, Code 424, Zip 42424.
demo.register: Accounts are deleted periodically. Feel free to use any email to register, enter a Stripe test card: 4242 4242 4242 4242, Code 424, Zip 42424.
demo.couponText: Apply this test coupon to see how it gives you 50% discount, only 100 available: test50
demo.cfdisWarning: Keep in mind that the codebase DOES NOT INCLUDE CFDis implementation (Mexico digital invoices). Which means when you upload a receipt, you cannot drag an XML and PDF file to convert it to a transaction. This is because this is the core functionality of this website facturaesto.com. If you need it, you need to implement it yourself.

errors.onlyOwner: Ownly owners can perform this operation
errors.onlyAdmin: Ownly admins and owners can perform this operation
errors.onlyMember: Ownly members, admins or owners can perform this operation

errors.userNotInTenant: You don't belong to the current tenant

errors.limitReachedRfc: You have reached the workspaces limit
errors.limitReachedUsers: You have reached the members limit
errors.limitReachedTickets: You have reached the receipts limit

workspaces.createDescription: If you have more than 1 workspace, add its details.
workspaces.none: You have not added any workspace
workspaces.deleteWarning: WARNING: Once you delete it, you will not be able to see any of its transactions.
workspaces.cannotBeWithoutWorkspaces: There must be at least 1 workspace
workspaces.askAdminToAddYou: Ask an administrator to add you to a workspace.

errors.notAdded: You have not added this workspace
errors.existingRfc: There's already a workspace with the same name

projects.createDescription: To organize your receipts and transactions, add projects.

errors.notAMember: You are not a member of this team
errors.alreadyMemberWithSameName: There's already a project with that name in your organisation

transactions.newManualDescription: If you don't have the receipt, register manually.

tickets.uploadDescription: Upload receipt photos and we generate the invoices.
tickets.uploadTicketsWithPhoneDescription: Use our robot to send receipts and to track your expenses
tickets.inLessThan24hrs: In less than 48 hrs you'll receive your invoices.
tickets.noTicketsNorInvoices: There are no receipts and transactions

upload.hint: Make sure your photos are readable.
upload.successDescription1: Receipts uploaded successfully, you will get the invoices in less than 48 hours.
upload.limitReached: You can no longer upload receipts, your subscription includes {0} receipts per month

uploadErrors.websiteNotFoundNotPickingUp: Website and they won't answer the phone
uploadErrors.noXmlNorPdf: You have not added a valid XML and PDF

warnings.removingUser: This user will no longer be able to upload receipts/invoices to this workspace.

errors.reportError?: You will report the error to the user.
errors.canEditOnlyPending: You can only edit pending receipts
errors.cannotBeDeleted: You cannot delete the receipt, it already has transactions
errors.cannotDeleteTransaction: You cannot delete an invoiced receipt
errors.existingTransaction: Could not define error, it has an existing transaction.
errors.invalidChannel: Define how you generated the invoice
errors.hasMoreThanOneTransaction: Receipt has more than one transaction
errors.monthlyTicketsExceded: You have reached the receipts limit, upgrade your subscription to add more
errors.monthlyTicketsWillExcede: You cannot add this many receipts, upgrade your subscription to add more
